description: Le Directeur général des équipements aérospatiaux n'a besoin de service de réparation et d'entretien pour les parachutes et l'équipement connexe.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal: Parachute and Related Equipment
## PW-23-01026837 - Competitive Bidding

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the procurement of parachute and related equipment, including sustainment, delivery, and repair services in support of the Royal Canadian Air Force’s (RCAF) worldwide operations.

### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: W8485-23SL01
* Solicitation Date: February 21, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: May 16, 2023, 14:00:00 (local time)
* Amendment Number: 4

### Supply Requirements

The DND requires the following goods and services:

* Parachutes and related equipment, including:
	+ Parachutes
	+ Harnasses
	+ Hoists
	+ Litters
* Repair and/or overhaul services for parachute and related equipment
* Supply chain management and logistics support

### Security Requirements

The procurement is subject to security requirements, which can be found in Annex C - Security Requirement Check List. Bidders must ensure that their proposal and associated documentation meet these requirements.

### Evaluation Criteria

 Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical analysis and review of the bidder’s experience and capacity
* Past performance and reputation
* Price and value for money
* Other requirements specified in the solicitation

### Important Documents

* Solicitation Document (W8485-23SL01) - English and French
* Annexes A - Performance Work Statement, B - Basis of Payment, and C - Security Requirement Check List
* Appendix 1 - List of NSNs with bilingual descriptions
* Appendix 2 - Managed RO Process Flow Chart

### Contact Information

* Danny Lebel, Contracting Officer
* Email: dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca
* Telephone: (please contact the contractor)

### Notice of Proposal

This Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) solicits proposals for the above-mentioned requirements. Suppliers are invited to submit their proposals electronically using epost Connect or by mail/wire to the designated address. Suppliers may also submit their proposals in both official languages of Canada. It is the supplier’s responsibility to ensure that their proposal and supporting documentation meet all requirements and are received by the designated closing date. 

The Crown retains the right to negotiate the final terms and conditions of the contract with the selected supplier.
